cab.content: OPERATIONS.From:- General Plumers Italy. To:- GVI.G.S., War Office/Despatched 11,3 p.m. 10/12/17. Received 5.40 a.m, Il/l2/l7,0S115. December 10th.Situation has been generally quiet during last 48 hours. Our artillery activity and that of the French has produced a corresponding increase in the enemy's artillery activity in these sectors, Our airmen have accounted for five enemy machines and one observation ballrsn since we took over.
